about_the_game:
Step into the realm of shadows and mysteries of PHOTOBIA: Tales from the Dark, where you will be transported to a dimension where light becomes your guide through the unknown.

A Journey Between Light and Shadow

Explore an enigmatic universe full of secrets. Navigate multidimensional labyrinths by manipulating the essence of light, while space and time intertwine in an infinite dance of puzzles that challenge the very perception of reality.

The Power of Manipulation

In this dark realm, nothing is as it seems. Bend the laws of physics through seven mystical shades of light, transform yourself to traverse the surrounding space, and overcome seemingly impossible challenges. Each dimension hides secrets, and every direction reveals new possibilities.

Mastery of Reality

Go beyond the limits of the possible as you master control over physics, space, and time. Each puzzle is an opportunity to explore new ways of interacting with this mystical world, where reality bends to your will.

Three Paths to Enlightenment

  • Story Mode

An ancient riddle lies hidden in the depths of the dark realm. As you progress through increasingly complex levels, fragments of an unsettling truth begin to emerge from the shadows. Manipulate light and space-time not only to advance but to unveil a mystery that transcends the very understanding of reality.

  • Hardcore Mode

An altered dimension where time is limited, and shadows take on even more unsettling forms. Only the most enlightened explorers will uncover the deepest secrets of this transformed realm.

  • Sandbox Mode

Become a creator of worlds in the Steam Workshop. Shape new dimensions according to your vision and share your creations with other explorers. Discover the mysterious worlds forged by the community in an ever-expanding universe.

Cross the veil between light and shadow in PHOTOBIA: Tales from the Dark, where every step brings you closer to the truth hidden in darkness. The dark realm awaits your awakening.

name: PHOTOBIA: Tales from the Dark

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 256 MB of video memory.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 512 MB of video memory.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in the dark and mysterious universe of PHOTOBIA: Tales from the Dark, where intricate light-based puzzles await. Use physics to overcome obstacles and bring light to the heart of this enigmatic world.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Traditional Chinese
